item.title: Intro to Cluster Analysis in R and Stata
item.description: The focus here will on how to implement cluster analysis in R and in Stata. There is often a great deal of confusion related to clustering- when to use it, which type of clustering algorithm to use, how to implement it, and how to interpert the results. something subsomething this looks like code but isnâ€™t 1+1 ## [1] 2
